author: tr1.xxy
content: <@761645159095599144> <@570268431522201601>  I have been trying to implement the bandersnatch curve in sage in the short weierstrass form with negative a and b. Sage automatically changes them to the positive modulo of the prime which is okay until I try to define the generator of bandersnatch as a point on the curve. Then it shows an error saying that the point I am trying to define doesn't lie on the curve. This shouldn't be happening right? Any ways to fix this?
